## Description {#details}

ABI support base class.

Used to write resolver, stub, and trampoline blocks.

Definition at line 36 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/epcindirectionutils-h">EPCIndirectionUtils.h</a>.
